alert.note: Alert for Haleakala Summit (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 8:21AM HST until January 10 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING FOR BIG ISLAND SUMMITS THROUGH TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY FOR HALEAKALA AND PORTIONS OF LEEWARD BIG ISLAND THROUGH THE REST OF TODAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with localized gusts to 60 mph. * WHERE...Haleakala Summit. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winds this strong can make driving and walking difficult. The winds can forcefully open doors and damage hinges or slam doors shut, possibly causing injuries.
info.instruction: Consider postponing travel to the summits until conditions improve. If you must travel to the summits, use extra caution walking and driving. Be careful opening or closing doors.
